institution.bdy:
LINKdotNET is an
Egypt ian ISP and internet company.
The first precursor of LINKdotNET was InTouch Communications. Established in 1992, InTouch was the first ISP in Egypt. Another company, Link Egypt, was formed in 1995 to provide internet services and solutions.
In June 2000, InTouch Communications and Link Egypt merged to become LINKdotNET. LINKdotNET is backed by the technical and financial resources of
Orascom Telecom Holding Company ,1 the largest integrated telecommunications services provider in the region, which serves twenty markets throughout the Middle East and Africa.
In May 2002, LINKdotNET acquired eight leading Egyptian internet companies, all established and popular dotcoms, significantly raising the company’s value, and making it the region’s largest internet company, with over 1500 employees.
In February 2008, LINKdotNET started their operations in
Pakistan , by acquiring two major ISPs WOL & Dancom, with the name "LINKdotNET Pakistan". The services offered in Pakistan include the broadband Internet through DSL and
WiMAX
technologies for the Home and Corporate users along with the traditional Dialup Internet. LINKdotNET Pakistan has a strong backing of Orascom Telecom to serve the massive poplulation of Pakistan.
LINKdotNET is a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner in Business Process and Integration, Custom Development Solutions, Information Worker Solutions, Microsoft Business Solutions and Advanced Infrastructure Solutions.
Link Development is a subsidiary of LINKdotNET. Link Development delivers technology solutions. Boasting a team of young IT professionals, most of whom are Microsoft certified on the latest Microsoft enterprise platforms and technologies, providing its customers with the best solutions and services. Link Development is also CMMI Level 3 accredited and ISO 9001:2000 certified. Link Development is also aliased by LinkDev or Link Dev.
Link Development has offices in
Egypt , UAE,
Saudi Arabia ,
Italy
and
Pakistan serving a great number of governments, Fortune 500 multinationals, and leading local companies among its clients. Link Development's client portfolio includes Intel,
Microsoft ,
Unilever , the Egyptian government, Tejari, MobiNil,
Telecom Egypt
, and Showtime, just to mention a few.
